bibl.title: P. Duk. inv. 4R: Homer, Iliad 22.111-149 with Marginalia.
bibl.note: P. Duke Inv. 4 recto (= M.-P.3 988.1; LDAB 2266). Provenance unknown, Ia. On the verso, unpublished text listing the names of Ptolemaic dynasts and their regnal years (= M.-P.3 2209.01; LDAB 6771) . - Introduction. - The Text. - Notes. - The Marginal Annotations: Παραβολή and Ἀνταπόδοσις.
bibl.seg: BONGIOVANNI Roberto, P. Duk. inv. 4R: Homer, Iliad 22.111-149 with Marginalia.
